text: point, tbl Tablespan object contains complete logical definition table can exported styled.
code: library(tablespan) library(dplyr)  data(mtcars)  summarized_table <- mtcars |>   group_by(cyl, vs) |>   summarise(     N = n(),     mean_hp = mean(hp),     sd_hp = sd(hp),     mean_wt = mean(wt),     sd_wt = sd(wt),     .groups = "drop")  tbl <- tablespan(   data = summarized_table,   formula = Cylinder:cyl + Engine:vs ~     N +     (`Horse Power` = Mean:mean_hp + SD:sd_hp) +     (`Weight` = Mean:mean_wt + SD:sd_wt),   title = "Motor Trend Car Road Tests",   subtitle = "A table created with tablespan",   footnote = "Data from the mtcars data set")
